price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߘߊߞߘߐ߫ ߞߎߡߊ ߞߍ߫ ߢߐ߲߮ ߝߍ߬ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߫ ߥߛߎ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߝߏ߫ ( ߕߟߋ߬ ) ߕߊ߲߫ ߘߐߙߐ߲߫
arabic: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا عَشۡرٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yatakhāfatūna baynahum in labith'tum illā ʿashran
